name: DV and Trafficking Crisis Line & FGM/C Support Line
description: AWS has a 24-hour, confidential, toll-free crisis line: 1-877-751-0880 Connect callers with advocates that speak your language (41 languages available)
fullDescription: AWS has a 24-hour, confidential, toll-free crisis line: 1-877-751-0880 Connect callers with advocates that speak your language (41 languages available)
whatTheyOffer: AWS has a 24-hour, confidential, toll-free crisis line: 1-877-751-0880 Trained crisis line workers respond to calls and connect callers with language advocates when needed. Callers can get over-the-phone support, safety planning, access to AWS services, and information and referrals.
